function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negative association between closure of bars and restaurants and transmission rates","Impact":"Misleading results and inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Adjust the model to account for other variables such as weather","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, regression analysis","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for weather variable in the initial model","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of the impact of bar and restaurant closures","Mitigation":"Include weather variable in the analysis to account for its effect on transmission rates","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, regression analysis","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"},{"Description":"Large AIC for Model 4 compared to other models","Impact":"Validation of the delay of 7 days may be inaccurate","Mitigation":"Conduct further sensitivity analysis, consider alternative explanations for the large AIC","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, sensitivity analysis","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"}]}
